title: League Server Broken? (EuNe)
body: I was in a game and everything was working fine untill it froze and the: attempting to recconect sign pops up. My internet is fine and iwe restarted my computer so im wondering if its the server.

replies.body: I haven't heard anything about this, I'm afraid.  When you get a chance, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the EUNE game server: 31.186.224.42.  Run it for about 5 minutes and let me know what you get, that way we can see where the hiccup was coming from.
Same here, I cant even reconnect. I was even winning the game, Rito wtf.
